data.title: Aissa Wayne: John Wayne’s Daughter, Who Married Three Times Like Her Father
data.meta_description: Are you curious about John Wayne’s Daughter? Click here to learn more about Aisse Wayne, the daughter who married three times like her father!
data.text:
What do you know about The Duke besides his legendary acting career in Western movies?

You probably don’t know that John Wayne got married three times and had seven kids. Today, we’ll talk about Aisse Wayne, John Wayne’s daughter, with his last wife, Pilar Palette.

An Overview of Aisse Wayne

Aisse Wayne was born on March 31, 1956, and she’s 68 years old. The American actress didn’t only become famous because of her acting career—she was already renowned since her birth thanks to her legendary father, American actor John Wayne.

The famous actor nicknamed The Duke throughout his acting career, passed away in 1979 when Aisse was only 23. After his death, Aisse became a lawyer instead of continuing her acting career.

Aisse is the daughter of John Wayne from his third and last wife, Pilar Palette. Pilar and John married in 1954 until the actor died in 1979.

Pilar is 95 years old and married to Jesse L.Upchurch, her fourth husband, whom she married in 1998.

The Career of Aisse Wayne

Because of her father’s acting career, Aisse entered acting at a young age. Her first appearance was in The Alamo, a historical drama film. She was only four years old then, and the movie scored colossal success, even getting nominated for and winning an Academy Award.

Only one year later, Aisse appeared as Bessie in The Comancheros, a romantic action movie. The movie also turned out to be a huge success, winning two Academy Awards.

Aside from these two movies in her early life, Aisse also appeared in Hollywood Greats, McLintock!, and Donovan’s Reef.

After her father’s death, Aisse wrote a book about him titled John Wayne: My Father. The book was published in 1998, and then Aisse went on to work as a lawyer. She’s reportedly still working as an attorney in LA, California.

In 2016, she publicly supported Donald Trump’s candidacy for President of the United States.

Aisse Wayne’s Family

Aisse Wayne’s parents

John Wayne got married three times and had seven kids. Though that means Aisse has six siblings, she only shares two with her mother and father: Marisa Wayne and Ethan Wayne.

Her siblings are Patrick Wayne, Mary Antonia Wayne, Melinda Wayne, and Michael Wayne. They’re all the kids of John Wayne and Josephine Alicia, his first wife. John had no kids with his second wife, Esperanza Baur, despite staying married for eight years.

Aside from her parental family, Aisse Wayne got married three times herself. Like father like daughter!

Her first marriage was to Earl Lawrence Kuhle II in 1981.

She had two kids with her first husband: Jennifer Wayne, born in 1982, and Nicholas Kuhle, born in 1983.

In 1984, she broke things off with her husband, and two years later, she married Thomas Gionis.

The marriage lasted only two years, and the couple only had one daughter: Anastasia Pilar Gionis.

Finally, in 2002, Aisse tied the knot for the third time after staying single for 14 years. She married Richard Putnam Robinson, to whom she’s currently married. However, she didn’t have any kids with him.

FAQs

1. How Old is Aissa Wayne?

Aissa Wayne was born on March 31, 1956, making her 68 years old as of 2024.

2. What is Aissa Wayne’s Profession?

Aissa Wayne is an attorney in Los Angeles. She was previously an actress.

3. How Many Times Has Aissa Wayne Be Married?

Aissa Wayne has been married three times.

4. Does Aissa Wayne have Children?

Aissa Wayne has three children: Jennifer Wayne, Nicholas Kuhle, and Anastasia Pilar Gionis.

5. Did Aissa Wayne Publicly Support a Political Candidate?

Yes, in 2016, Aissa Wayne publicly supported Donald Trump as president of the United States.

Final Thoughts

Though John Wayne died more than four decades ago, his legacy still lives on—not only through his movies but also through his kids.

Aisse Wayne is his daughter from his third wife, Pilar Palette. She became a young actress when she was only four but didn’t follow in her father’s footsteps after his death.

Instead, she chose to work with her bachelor’s degree and become a lawyer.
